title: Article 9 : Innate protein restricts HIV replication by targeting lipid rafts
description: AIBP, one of our proteins, acts on particular parts of our cells' plasma membrane which are useful to HIV-1 when infecting a cell.

title: Article 8 : Antiretroviral HIV medication attenuates liver fibrosis
description: One medicine used for treating HIV has benefits on liver fibrosis

title: Article 7 : Can Gene Therapy Cure HIV? US Gov't. Is Banking $100 Million On It.
description: The U.S. National Institutes of Health and The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation are willing to cure HIV and sickle cell disease with gene therapies and will invest each 100 million dollars in 4 years on it
categories: Gene therapy and other new treatments

title: Article 6 : Taking shape: Scientists propose new structure for shell of HIV-1 virus
description: We may have misunderstood the shape of the virus. Scientists propose a new one.

description: A new, more efficient antiretroviral therapy has been launched in Zimbabwe

description: The university of Gent found where the residual cells of the disease hid

title: Article 1 : UC San Diego Researchers Isolate Switch that Kills Inactive HIV
description: Researchers have found a gene regulating HIV replication. Inactivating this gene would stop HIV multiplication.
